{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_FireArrow}} '''A_FireArrow''' (string ''proj'')
Fires an actor of type ''proj'', with a spread of up to 5.625Â°. This is affected by the player's accuracy: every two {{Class|UpgradeAccuracy|accuracy upgrade}} decreases the spread by half. The player using the calling weapon is then put in the Melee state for the relevant {{Class|PlayerPawn}} class, if any, and the sound "weapons/xbowshoot" is played on the WEAPON channel. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|StrifeCrossbow}} and derived classes. == Examples == Taked from [[Classes:StrifeCrossbow|strife electric crossbow]] fire state: Fire: XBOW A 3 [[A_ClearFlash]] XBOW B 6 A_FireArrow("[[Classes:ElectricBolt|ElectricBolt]]") XBOW C 4 XBOW D 6 XBOW E 3 XBOW F 5 XBOW G 0 [[A_ShowElectricFlash]] XBOW G 5 [[A_CheckReload]] Goto Ready+1 Same, but for [[Classes:StrifeCrossbow2|strife poison crossbow]]: Fire: XBOW H 3 XBOW B 6 A_FireArrow("[[Classes:PoisonBolt|PoisonBolt]]") XBOW C 4 XBOW D 6 XBOW E 3 XBOW I 5 XBOW J 5 A_CheckReload Goto Ready [[Category:Decorate Strife functions]] [[Category:Decorate Weapon attack functions]] [[Category:Decorate Restricted functions]]{{DEFAULTSORT:FireArrow}}
